topics.body: Speaking of stories I just realized something; is it just me or do in movies, plays, books, tv shows 99% of the time the villain loses cause they did something extremely incompetent and as a result lost rather than the hero actually overcoming them legitimately?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
